		<item>
		<title>Flashy Improvements Are Turning Gene-Editing Technology Into Swiss Army Knife Of Treatments</title>
		<link>https://khn.org/morning-breakout/flashy-improvements-are-turning-gene-editing-technology-into-swiss-army-knife-of-treatments/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 13:51:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Public Health]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://khn.org/?post_type=daily-breakout&p=814629</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Scientists were already excited about CRISPR's potential as a total game-changer in curing illnesses, and now it's been taken up another level. In other public health news: stem cells, gut bacteria, neighborhoods' effects on health, and smog. ]]></description>
				<content:encoded><![CDATA[Scientists were already excited about CRISPR's potential as a total game-changer in curing illnesses, and now it's been taken up another level. In other public health news: stem cells, gut bacteria, neighborhoods' effects on health, and smog. ]]></content:encoded>
		
		<media:content url="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/ed0387e9eab0b4c18ccdb421b7613252?s=96&d=identicon&r=G" medium="image">
			<media:title type="html">brilabuskes</media:title>
		</media:content>
	</item>
		<item>
		<title>Mystery Deepens Over Head Injuries Of U.S. Diplomats In Cuba</title>
		<link>https://khn.org/morning-breakout/mystery-deepens-over-head-injuries-of-u-s-diplomats-in-cuba/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 13:51:29 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Public Health]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://khn.org/?post_type=daily-breakout&p=814625</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[The diplomats showed signs of a concussion, though they received no blows to the head. Experts are stumped on what happened.]]></description>
				<content:encoded><![CDATA[The diplomats showed signs of a concussion, though they received no blows to the head. Experts are stumped on what happened.]]></content:encoded>
		
		<media:content url="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/ed0387e9eab0b4c18ccdb421b7613252?s=96&d=identicon&r=G" medium="image">
			<media:title type="html">brilabuskes</media:title>
		</media:content>
	</item>
		<item>
		<title>A Single Pharmacy In A Tiny West Virginia Town Was Shipped 12.3 Million Doses Of Opioids Over 8-Year Period</title>
		<link>https://khn.org/morning-breakout/a-single-pharmacy-in-a-tiny-west-virginia-town-was-shipped-12-3-million-doses-of-opioids-over-8-year-period/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 13:51:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Public Health]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://khn.org/?post_type=daily-breakout&p=814622</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[The House Energy and Commerce Committee has launched an investigation into how that slipped by regulators' attention. News on the opioid crisis comes out of Maryland, Pennsylvania and Arizona, as well.]]></description>
				<content:encoded><![CDATA[The House Energy and Commerce Committee has launched an investigation into how that slipped by regulators' attention. News on the opioid crisis comes out of Maryland, Pennsylvania and Arizona, as well.]]></content:encoded>
		
		<media:content url="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/ed0387e9eab0b4c18ccdb421b7613252?s=96&d=identicon&r=G" medium="image">
			<media:title type="html">brilabuskes</media:title>
		</media:content>
	</item>
		<item>
		<title>Flu Vaccine Only 25% Effective Against Most Common Strain, But Officials Still Urge People To Get Shot</title>
		<link>https://khn.org/morning-breakout/flu-vaccine-only-25-effective-against-most-common-strain-but-officials-still-urge-people-to-get-shot/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 13:51:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Health Industry]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Public Health]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://khn.org/?post_type=daily-breakout&p=814618</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[Against all virus strains, this year's vaccine has been 36 percent effective midway through a harsh flu season. "We are a bit concerned that the performance of the vaccine right now might reduce interest in getting vaccinated in the future,” said Dr. Anne Schuchat, acting CDC director.]]></description>
				<content:encoded><![CDATA[Against all virus strains, this year's vaccine has been 36 percent effective midway through a harsh flu season. "We are a bit concerned that the performance of the vaccine right now might reduce interest in getting vaccinated in the future,” said Dr. Anne Schuchat, acting CDC director.]]></content:encoded>
		
		<media:content url="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/ed0387e9eab0b4c18ccdb421b7613252?s=96&d=identicon&r=G" medium="image">
			<media:title type="html">brilabuskes</media:title>
		</media:content>
	</item>
		<item>
		<title>Investigation In Aetna’s Approval Process Expands Into More States</title>
		<link>https://khn.org/morning-breakout/investigation-in-aetnas-approval-process-expands-into-more-states/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 13:51:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Courts]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Health Industry]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Insurance]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[States]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://khn.org/?post_type=daily-breakout&p=814615</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[The inquiry kicked off after statements by a former medical director came to light that he never looked at patients' records when deciding whether to approve or deny care. Aetna says the comments were taken out of context. Meanwhile, Anthem is changing its emergency room program after it received pushback from providers and lawmakers. ]]></description>
				<content:encoded><![CDATA[The inquiry kicked off after statements by a former medical director came to light that he never looked at patients' records when deciding whether to approve or deny care. Aetna says the comments were taken out of context. Meanwhile, Anthem is changing its emergency room program after it received pushback from providers and lawmakers. ]]></content:encoded>
		
		<media:content url="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/ed0387e9eab0b4c18ccdb421b7613252?s=96&d=identicon&r=G" medium="image">
			<media:title type="html">brilabuskes</media:title>
		</media:content>
	</item>
		<item>
		<title>Ohio Law Banning Down Syndrome Abortions ‘Unconstitutional,’ ACLU Says In Suit</title>
		<link>https://khn.org/morning-breakout/ohio-law-banning-down-syndrome-abortions-unconstitutional-aclu-says-in-suit/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 13:51:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Public Health]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[States]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://khn.org/?post_type=daily-breakout&p=814632</guid>
		<description><![CDATA[The suit seeks to delay enforcement of the law, which is scheduled to go into effect March 23.]]></description>
				<content:encoded><![CDATA[The suit seeks to delay enforcement of the law, which is scheduled to go into effect March 23.]]></content:encoded>
		
		<media:content url="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/ed0387e9eab0b4c18ccdb421b7613252?s=96&d=identicon&r=G" medium="image">
			<media:title type="html">brilabuskes</media:title>
		</media:content>
	</item>
	</channel>
</rss>
